title: The U.S. unveils another $400 million in military aid for Ukraine.
description: The package encompassed more missiles for HAWK air defense systems and more ammunition for the high-tech HIMARS rocket launchers that Ukraine has used against Russian forces to devastating effect.
dc:creator: Dan Bilefsky and John Ismay

media:content.media:description: The Ukrainian military firing a rocket in the Kherson region on Saturday using a HIMARS system, an advanced rocket launcher.
